author: Jonathan Chait
title: Republicans Say Impeachment Distracted Trump From Preparing for Coronavirus
description: Well, also television. There was a lot of good content on Fox News.
content: President Trump has deflected the blame for his inept response to the coronavirus onto an astonishing number of people and entities: China, the Obama administration, governors, General Motors, hospital thieves, among others. But no excuse is quite as audaciou… [+6999 chars]
